Wedge Formation

  1. CUSTOM CARD WARNING
    What happens if my Snapdragon is in Bot mode my Opponent plays a     Pep Talk to draw 2 after they draw their first card of the turn, do they scrap 2 cards or 1? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    If your opponent has already drawn for turn, whether they draw 1 card with a card like Wedge Formation or 2 cards with a card like Pep Talk, they will only scrap 1 card from hand because of the “1 or more cards” clause.
